subject: College Athletics
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Texas Tech Coach Mike Leach was fined a record $10,000 by the Big 12 Conference yesterday for his criticism of game officials after last week’s 59-43 loss to No. 12 Texas. The fine doubled the previous high by the league. Leach and Texas Tech declined to comment.
